channel.title: Adventure Items
channel.description: Find a D&D adventure to give your character the perfect piece of swag.

item.title: DDAL10-01 - The Frozen North
item.description: Goggles of Night, 3 potions, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Frozen North

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 16, 2020

An avalanche has stranded you and your allies in the treacherous Spine of the World, and a relentless blizzard is quickly blowing away all hope of survival. Gather the surviving members of your caravan and strike out for shelter. Strike out for life!

Items

  • Goggles of Night Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Comprehension Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Frostbitten
The Rescuers
The Special Delivery

A parcel containing a delivery of homemade goods to persons unknown. The crate and its contents count as a single trinket—one person among the group can keep them. While the individual items aren’t really useful, if the characters can figure out who they were intended for, the recipient may be incredibly happy to have them.

item.title: DDEP10-00 - Great Knucklehead Rally
item.description: Figurine of Wonderous Power (Snowy Owl aka Silver Raven), Horn of Silent Alarm, Mariner's Armor, Rope of Climbing, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Great Knucklehead Rally

Season 10 Epic for Tier 1 Released on September 18, 2020

To fight the despair brought on by the Everlasting Rime, an eccentric dwarf sponsors a fishing tournament she calls the “Great Knucklehead Rally.” The event draws the curious, the hopeful, and the cynical alike. And it also draws unexpected guests that test the mettle of the attendees.

Items

  • Figurine of Wonderous Power (Snowy Owl aka Silver Raven) Uncommon
  • Horn of Silent Alarm Common
  • Mariner's Armor Uncommon
  • Rope of Climbing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Bunny Slipper Snowshoes

Certain to keep your feet warm while traversing the arctic, these fashionable snowshoes expand and contract to fit any Small or Medium humanoid creature.

Campfire Ice Sculture

When placed on the ground in a cold climate, this tiny sculpture glows orange-red and emits heat enough for up to four Medium creatures within five feet to become comfortably warm.

Magical Slushy Grinder

When snow or ice are dropped into this trinket, it can produce up to 5 gallons of a sweet, lemon-flavored slush. Once used, the magic ceases to function until the next dawn.

item.title: DDAL10-00 - Ice Road Trackers
item.description: Boots of False Tracks, Ersatz Eye, Smoldering Armor, Studded Leather, Unbreakable Arrow, 2 potions, 2 scrolls, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Ice Road Trackers

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 14, 2020

A trek toward Icewind Dale turns deadly when an avalanche blocks the heroes’ passage through the Spine of the World. Rescued by a menagerie of strange creatures, the heroes are asked to return the favor in exchange for answers about what’s happening in the cold and frozen North.

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • Ersatz Eye Common
  • Smoldering Armor, Studded Leather Common
  • Unbreakable Arrow Common
  • 2 x Alchemist's fire (flask) Common
  • 1 x Oil of Slipperiness Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Poison) Uncommon
  • 2 x Spell Scroll of Cure Wounds Common

item.title: DDAL09-18 - Consequences of Choice
item.description: Oathbow, Ring of Warmth, 2 potions, 2 scrolls, 2 story awards, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Consequences of Choice

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on July 20, 2020

The soul of the commander of the Bloody Hooves has been spirited away by Zariel’s lieutenant, General Everbleed. The Bloody Hooves are in disarray and will not be the fighting force Dara had hoped without the iron will of their commander to direct them. To find them amidst the battlefields of Avernus, you are going to need help. Hopefully you have made some friends in the Nine Hells…

Items

  • Oathbow Very Rare
  • Ring of Warmth Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Blade Barrier Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Investiture of Wind Very Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Failed to Protect!

Your efforts to improve the defenses of the Wandering Emporium were insufficient to keep everyone alive. (Circle appropriately.)

Fai ChenAliveDead
SlaggAliveDead
ElliachAliveDead
RasshAliveDead
Fhet’AhlaAliveDead
One-or-TwoAliveDead
SkidsAliveDead
Verwyyr*AliveDead
Raskamedies*AliveDead
Glanring Ironbelly*AliveDead
You Let Dara Die!

You failed to keep Dara alive during this adventure. This impacts her abilities when next you meet! How many times did she die? _______

item.title: DDAL09-19 - Fang and Claw
item.description: Scarab of Protection, Shield, +2, a potion, a scroll, 4 story awards, and 5 other items
item.content:encoded:
Fang and Claw

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on July 20, 2020

Zariel’s Lieutenant General Everbleed has fled with Commander De La Reue’s soul, only to be captured by Yeenoghu’s brood preparing to rampage! Dara implores you to recover the commander, though his soul has been taken to a most unusual place. Part One of the Red Hunt series of adventures.

Items

  • Scarab of Protection Legendary
  • Shield, +2 Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Meteor Swarm Legendary
  • 5 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Clever Torso

You are carrying the armless, legless torso of a ghast—the infernal architect Khemed Rein. Khemed can talk and is desperate to escape the Nine Hells. If you fail a saving throw while carrying Khemed, you can choose to have the effect target him instead. This always destroys him, even if the effect deals no damage. If you leave the Nine Hells, you can return Khemed to his homeland and he is forever in your debt.

Ice Pact

The ice devil General Everbleed is escorting you on your mission to recover the soul of Rotger de la Reue. You can control the fiend in combat, but the DM can take control of his actions at any time. If you leave the Nine Hells, the general’s debt of service is removed, and he leaves your side.

Lost Hope

The name of the person whom you care for the most has been revealed to the demons of the Abyss, and you cannot shake the fear that they are being hunted. You gain an additional bond: “My actions have endangered my loved one.” At the end of every adventure you play, roll a d20. On a result of a 1, your fears come true as the demon prince Yeenoghu assassinates your loved one. The only way to remove this story award is to kill Yeenoghu.

You Let Dara Die

You failed to keep Dara alive during this adventure. This impacts her abilities when next you meet! How many times did she die? _______

item.title: DDAL09-20 - Where Devils Fear to Tread
item.description: Deathshield (Defender, Greatsword), Rod of the Pact Keeper, +2, 2 potions, a scroll, 4 story awards, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Where Devils Fear to Tread

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on July 20, 2020

The Commander’s soul has been cast through the portal into the Death Dells. You must follow into the lair of Yeenoghu and rescue the Commander before the Beast of Butchery devours him! Part Two of the Red Hunt series of adventures.

Items

  • Deathshield (Defender, Greatsword) Legendary
  • Rod of the Pact Keeper, +2 Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Flying Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Longevity Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Gate Legendary
  • 3 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Birth of a Demon Prince

Against all advice and sanity, you have consumed the essence of the Demon Prince Yeenoghu on his home plane: the 422nd layer of the Abyss. Raw chaos and incarnate evil flows through your body, warping it into the monster that your nightmares feared might dwell within. As you change, the layer responds to suit your whims, twisting with newfound corruption. You are forever retired from D&D Adventurers League play and you cannot be returned by any means. This character’s story has ended for you, but your friends have gained a powerful new enemy who knows them all too well.

Enemy of Elisande

You have attempted to solve a problem with Elisande by using violence against her. The Chosen of Cyric will not forget.

Thanks of Ilmater

You have worked the will of the gods of light to maintain the balance of the Blood War. If you are 20th level (or upon achieving 20th level) you may select the boon of immortality or the boon of planar travel from the Dungeon Master’s Guide. If you select the boon of planar travel, it takes you to the Brightwater: the realm of Ilmater and Sune in the Seven Heavens of Celestia.

Tipping the Balance

You have drastically altered the balance of the Blood War, potentially bringing about the end of reality. All devils bare you a grudge and you make all Charisma checks against fiends at disadvantage. In addition, they no longer answer your call. All spells or abilities that summon a devil automatically fail.

item.title: CCC-ODFC-03-03 - The Cause of All Life's Problems
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant), Tankard of Sobriety, a scroll, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Cause of All Life's Problems

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on July 19, 2020

Riswyn Rumnaheim, a young female dwarf, has recently discovered that her sister has survived the Rage of Demons, but alas, this sister has been tainted by the Abyssal presence of the demon that owns her soul. She is on the lookout for adventurers to help her remove the taint, allowing her to recover at least some of the family that she lost. The characters will discover how to cleanse the soul and in so doing put down a rising evil that may threaten the surface.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant) Rare
  • Tankard of Sobriety Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Locate Object Uncommon

Story Awards

Friend of the Clan Rumnaheim

As a Friend of Clan Rumnaheim, you can request entrance to the Earthspur Mines and Town, even if they are currently closed to outsiders. If Riswyn, new head of Clan Rumnaheim, is present at the mines (at the discretion of the DM), she can vouchsafe your good behavior and have you granted entrance. If you abuse this trust (at the discretion of the DM), void this story award.

Honorary Member of Clan Rumnaheim

You are considered an honorary member of the Rumnaheim clan. On your interactions within the Earthspur Mines and Town you are considered a dwarf, even if you are of a different race. For better or for worse.

item.title: DDAL-EB-06 - The Last Word
item.description: Ring of Evasion, Wand of Fear, Weapon, +1, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Last Word

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on June 2, 2020

Guided by prophecy, the adventurers seek out a spy operating in the heart of Wroat’s Royal Court. The Oracle of War has linked him to a great turning point in Khorvaire’s future, but he’s embedded in deep cover and difficult to reach. Thankfully, every agent has a weak link, and love is blind.

Items

  • Ring of Evasion Rare
  • Wand of Fear Rare
  • Weapon, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Legacy Events

Dark Lanterns Flicker

Mercutia ir'Gontarli was assassinated during the ball. The city of Wroat is put on high alert as rumors swirl about who could be responsible. This event has repercussions later in the campaign.

Runaway Lovers

You helped Orsino and Cesaria escape to build new lives for themselves. They are forever grateful for your assistance.

  • Once only, during any adventure in the Oracle of War campaign, you can call on Orsino for assistance. You must have at least 8 hours free to contact him. Orsino's spy network can answer three questions for you, as per the commune spell. When you use this legacy event, all players in your group must remove it from their Adventure Records.
Silver Torch Extinguished

Oliviér ir'Volett was exposed during the ball as a spy and assassin and paid the ultimate price. As the authorities trace his steps, word spreads that the nation of Thrane could be responsible for the killing. This event has repercussions later in the campaign.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-1 - A Reopened Eye
item.description: Enduring Spellbook, Fey Cloak of Protection, a spellbook, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Reopened Eye

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

Conflicts arising in both the Feywild and the Prime have caused some in both planes to call for a return of the Balance, and for new alliances between the fey and mortals. A seer new to the Moonshaes has prophesied your help in opening a new portal between these worlds. Part 1 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Enduring Spellbook Common
  • Fey Cloak of Protection Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • The Tome of Anothas: absorb elements, alarm, cause fear, comprehend languages, detect magic, feather fall, mage armor, magic missile, alter self, dragon's breath, knock, magic weapon, mind spike, Nystul's magic aura, tongues, catnap, counterspell, Leomund's tiny hut, summon lesser demons, charm monster, Mordenkainen's faithful hound, enervation, hold monster, infernal calling, Rary's telepathic bond, and create homunculus

Story Awards

Ashoral’s Friendship

You met with the guardian of the moonwell and resolved your differences peacefully, rather than resorting to violence. The druid guardian Ashoral considers you a friend, which may bear fruit at a later date.

Zanz’s Appreciation

You rescued Zanzantook from his fate of being devoured by animals enraged at his terrible poetry. Whether you like it or not, he considers you a friend. This friendship may bear fruit at a later date.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-2 - Troubled Visions
item.description: Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind, Moon-Touched Sword, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Troubled Visions

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

A newly opened moonwell proves unstable. An eladrin community in the Feywild calls for aid, as their home has been torn asunder and transformed by planar rifts. You must enter the moonwell to seal the rifts threatening the region before this instability pours over to the Prime Material. Part 2 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Sword Common

Story Awards

Mairin’s Debt

Mairin is deeply indebted to you for proving her lineage. She has travelled to many places and knows a good deal of people across Faerûn. If you need an item or expert that isn’t easily obtained, she might be able to get it for you—given enough time.

Saviors of Temerity Bay

The adventurers saved a community of immortals from a troublesome peril; while it’s unlikely any eladrin or powerful fey will actually show up to help you if you ask, a spirit of the woods might allow you to pass, or a dire bear might decide to look elsewhere for a meal.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-3 - Planar Convergence
item.description: Horn of Silent Alarm, Javelin of Lightning, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Planar Convergence

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

After a moonwell portal is permanently opened to the Feywild, fey and humans have begun to live together in harmony. But when a new threat forms on the horizon, darkness threatens to overwhelm the moonwell and consume the Moonshae Isles. As the fey and human denizens rush to mount defenses, will their alliance be enough to defeat the coming army? Part 3 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Horn of Silent Alarm Common
  • Javelin of Lightning Uncommon

Story Awards

Asper the Jellyflumph Familiar

This tiny jellyfish is native to the Feywild, evidenced by its translucent body which strobes pastel colors that change with its mood. It floats through the skies as if the air was made of water. If killed or reduced to 0 hit points, the jellyflumph can be recalled via find familiar, and uses the statistics of a bat from the Monster Manual.

Critter Keeper

You’ve befriended the fey creatures that now inhabit Rushdown Wood. When traveling through the Rushdown Wood, you will find the creatures very helpful and often find them skittering around your feet or sitting on your shoulder.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-S1-01 - A Long Night
item.description: Immovable Rod, a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
A Long Night

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on May 3, 2020

This is a simple caravan job—deliver the mysterious box to Thentia. Just one thing—don't open the box. And protect it from all attacks. A Side Story to the Song of Fates.

Items

  • Immovable Rod Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Fire Breath Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Scorching Ray Uncommon

item.title: DDAL-EB-05 - A Century of Ashes
item.description: Sending Stones, a potion, 5 story awards, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
A Century of Ashes

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on May 3, 2020

The adventurers seek out a trusted sage of Morgrave University to help them unlock the mysteries of the Oracle of War, but their studies risk upsetting powerful forces. Morgrave is said to be a beacon of knowledge shining from the city’s tallest towers, yet the adventurers soon learn that it can also be a deep pit of corruption.

Items

  • Sending Stones Uncommon
  • 1 x Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Poison Uncommon

Legacy Events

Crystal Skull

You learned from the surviving members of Graystrife that Irullan Karnach stole a crystal skull from them that has the power to bring the dead back to life.

Flamewind's Favored

You impressed the sphinx Flamewind with your performance during the duel.

Maker's Mark

Zell Mar identified the missing dwarf Sulring Mroranon as the creator of the Oracle of War.

  • At the end of this adventure, your group can choose to spend 150 gp to trace Sulring's family and learn of his whereabouts on teh Day of Mourning. This information becomes important in DDAL-EB-08 Parliament of Gears.
Love Cats

With your assistance, Zell Mar impressed Jia during dinner. At the end of this adventure, you go carousing with Zell and Jia in the bars of Sharn. Roll a d6 and consult the chart below:

RollResult
1–2You got into a fight and made an enemy who may cause trouble for you in future.
3You found love! You are now dating someone.
4You gambled and earned 50 gp.
5–6You saved a couple from muggers. Start the next adventure with one extra hero point.
Stakeout

The Inquisitive you hired to locate Irullan Karnach after DDAL-EBEP-01 The Iron Titan has tailed her to an apartment in Sharn and is monitoring her movements. He'll keep you appraised of any developments.

item.title: CCC-ELF-03-01 - Death's Claw
item.description: Net of Warning and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Death's Claw

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 28, 2020

After a gruesome murder goes unsolved, characters are hired to investigate. When the murders continue, characters must race against time to stop a serial killer before it’s too late.

Items

  • Net of Warning Uncommon

Story Awards

Sir Ardem’s Abhorrence

Characters who participate in this adventure and accuse Sir Ardem of misbehavior get on his bad side. Ardem’s memory is long, especially against those who sleight him, and he is not likely to forget their accusations.

item.title: CCC-ELF-03-02 - Echoes of Rage
item.description: Vines of Avarice (Gloves of Thievery), Ilmater’s Respite (Wand of Smiles), a potion, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Echoes of Rage

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 28, 2020

As murders of non-humans continue in Hillsfar, the populace calls for drastic action against the city’s most xenophobic Senator. Can you find a way to stop the violence?

Items

  • Vines of Avarice (Gloves of Thievery) Uncommon
  • Ilmater’s Respite (Wand of Smiles) Common
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Story Awards

Hillsfar’s Cycle

One way or another, you resolved the dilemma with Sir Ardem Rohan and the boneclaw.

  • If Sir Ardem recanted his racist past and begged forgiveness, he may just be trying to save his own life. Nonetheless, you feel assured that others will follow his example.
  • If Sir Ardem was killed, despite Bert and Ranlynn’s pleas, you feel a bony, clawed fingertip brush against your cheek during your dreams every time you take a long rest. (This is not intended to have a mechanical effect, but characters earning this story award may face tangible consequences in future adventures.)
Why So Serious?

You used (or attempted to use) Ilmater’s Respite on another member of your adventuring party. On your return to Hillsfar, Bert and Kenna welcome you to their merry band of pranksters. Watch out for the blood pie!

item.title: CCC-ELF-04 - Blood of the Covenent
item.description: Enduring Spellbook, Rod of Rulership, 5 potions, a spellbook, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Blood of the Covenent

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on April 28, 2020

Deaths of non-humans in the City of Hillsfar has taken attention of the Red Plumes away from several attacks by werewolves in the docks. Kriv sent out a request for adventurers to assist on this matter.

Items

  • Enduring Spellbook Common
  • Rod of Rulership Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Spellbooks

  • Enduring Spellbook: fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, detect magic, identify, mage armor, magic missile, shield, detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step, counterpsell, fly, lightning bolt, banishment, stoneskin, cone of cold, scrying, wall of force, globe of invulnerability, teleport, mind blank, and time stop

Story Awards

Crazy Squirrel (Wizard) Pet

Wearing a purple robe and pointy hat, this adorable squirrel also wields a wooden staff with a glowing symbol of House Garaf (A werewolf face with the star of Selûne over it). If Speak with Animal is used to communicate with it, it says it is a wizard to the House of Garaf and its here to fight Sharr!

This Crazy Squirrel functions as a pet, does not contribute to combat, or provide any benefit beyond its adorableness!

item.title: CCC-NBDD-01-02 - Where Can She Be?
item.description: Clockwork Amulet, Hat of Disguise, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Where Can She Be?

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 28, 2020

A master criminal has been making her way across the Moonsea, stealing priceless treasures at every stop. It's up to you to trace her steps, find her allies, and stop her before she can claim her final prize.

Items

  • Clockwork Amulet Common
  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon

Story Awards

Do It A Capella

You have performed with the traveling a capella kenku bard troupe, Roc Capella. Should you encounter them again, you will be welcome to join in their performance and are treated as part of the band.

item.title: DDAL09-15 - Maddening Screams
item.description: Helm of Telepathy, Red Dragon Scale Male, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Maddening Screams

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

The final resting place of the Hellrider company known as the Bloody Hooves has been found. Unfortunately, the Canyon of Screams is well beyond the reach of safe haven, so you must protect Dara behind enemy lines with no one to count on but yourselves. Her holy mission, and your very souls, are at stake. Part One of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Helm of Telepathy Uncommon
  • Red Dragon Scale Male Very Rare

Story Awards

Faith and Trust

You’ve successfully retrieved the wards of faithfulness from the resting place of the Bloody Hooves.

item.title: DDAL09-16 - Honors Unforseen
item.description: Fochlucan Bandore (Instrument of the Bards), Ioun Stone of Leadership, a potion, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Honors Unforseen

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

Accompanying the Chosen of Ilmater and baring the newly discovered Ward of Faithfulness, you proceed further into the tomb of the Bloody Hooves. Time is running short. Zariel’s forces hunt for you even now. Part Two of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Fochlucan Bandore (Instrument of the Bards) Uncommon
  • Ioun Stone of Leadership Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

You Let Dara Die

Dara has now died _______ times while in your care. Every time she dies, Dara loses one of the following abilities, chosen at random: Damage Resistances, Condition Immunities, Magic Resistance, and Innate Spellcasting. If she loses all four, she has lost all of her abilities as a Chosen and may no longer return Hellriders or angels to life.

In future adventures that she’s featured in, your group uses the average number of deaths among the characters for determining how many abilities she has lost.

item.title: DDAL09-17 - In the Hand
item.description: Bag of Holding, Wand of the War Mage, +3, 3 potions, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
In the Hand

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

Your quest to return the Bloody Hooves is nearly at an end. Only the company’s commander remains and then you’ll be ready to ride to the rescue of fallen Elturel! Part Three of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Bag of Holding Uncommon
  • Wand of the War Mage, +3 Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Speed Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Vitality Very Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Torm's Chosen

For nobly giving yourself so that High Priest of Torm Horst Atheraice could be freed, Torm blessed a piece of your soul. The expedition is in peril as the opposition has gained key intelligence from you before killing you.

After suffering torture at the hands of General Everbleed’s devils, you died and are reborn in any location of your choice in Faerûn that has a temple to Torm, and the next time you die, you gain this benefit as well (as if a greater resurrection).

item.title: CCC-GSP02-02 - Stygia Untamed
item.description: Stygian Scale Mail (Smoldering Armor), Bulkawa’s Benevolence (Staff of the Python), a potion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Stygia Untamed

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Greasy Snitches on April 19, 2020

The valkyrie Sigrdri is looking for adventurers who can go with her to the Nine Hells. She is tasked to free heroic souls that are supposed to go to Ysgard but instead are stuck somewhere in different layers of hell. Her second mission is to save a kind and gentle snake guardian’s soul that is currently trapped in Stygia, the Fifth. Part Two of Heroes in Nine Hells.

Items

  • Stygian Scale Mail (Smoldering Armor) Common
  • Bulkawa’s Benevolence (Staff of the Python) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Banned: Stygia

The frozen, inhospitable wilderness of Stygia is home to many vile creatures as well as an uncountable number from the Material Plane. Desperate criminals and those condemned to death may pray to Levistus, the ruler of Stygia, for freedom; should he answer, they are transported here. For reasons known only to you and him, you are forever banned from setting foot within Stygia. Perhaps you redeemed too many souls, or maybe you were discovered to be in league with Geryon, the former ruler of this realm; regardless, Levistus has closed this layer of the Nine Hells to you. You can’t participate in further adventures in this place.

A character with this story award may visit other areas of the Nine Hells but has been banned from Stygia.

item.title: CCC-MMT-01-05 - Secrets of the Cure
item.description: Decanter of Endless Water, a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Secrets of the Cure

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Monkey Mind Tales on April 19, 2020

Some of the children at the Moonsea Children’s Hospital have come down with a rare illness. Director Salinop has not been able to determine what is causing the affliction. She has pleaded with local adventurers to help determine the cause and find a cure. Part Three of the Elua's Lighthouse adventures.

Items

  • Decanter of Endless Water Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Snare Common

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-08 - Winding Road to Freedom
item.description: Mantle of Freedom (Cloak of Billowing), Trident of Fish Command, a potion, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Winding Road to Freedom

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 19, 2020

A small community has arisen among the asymptomatic inhabitants of the Forbidden Zone which has brought much needed stability to the area. However, that peace is being threatened by a raving religious zealot. Can the two sides find common ground, or is the Forbidden Zone destined to erupt in barbarity once more? Part Fifteen of Song of Fates.

Items

  • Mantle of Freedom (Cloak of Billowing) Common
  • Trident of Fish Command Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (The Hierophant): Inverted

You freed the Collective from their empathic bond. There will be increasing strife among the community in the near future, but it will be freely chosen strife.

Tarot of Fate (The Hierophant): Upright

You did not remove the empathic link binding the Collective together. They will continue to a harmonious unit, even during the dark days to come.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-09 - The Thentia Job
item.description: a spellbook and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Thentia Job

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 19, 2020

Deep in Karasht Silverflame’s vault is an item that can control the infected Thentia citizens. Is he storing it for safekeeping or does he have sinister plans? The Selunites have tasked you with retrieving the item and finding out Karasht's plans. Part Sixteen of Song of Fates.

Spellbooks

  • Karasht’s Spellbook: expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, longstrider, alter self, rope trick, spider climb, blink, fly, haste, fabricate, polymorph, stoneshape, animate object, passwall, and telekinesis

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (Strength): Inverted

You retrieved the Woad heart from the Vault but did not hand it over to Kialila. Who knows what will become of the infected populace.

Tarot of Fate (Strength): Upright

You retrieved the Woad heart from the Vault and handed it over to Kialila. No doubt that the infected of Thentia are that much closer to a cure.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON5-1 - Bloodlust Rising
item.description: Admantine Chain Mail and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Rising

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

When it was just livestock, few took note. When people disappeared, things changed. Now farmsteads are burning and bloodthirsty cackling echo through the hills of old Gnarhelm in northern Alaron. The farmers are defenseless against such bloodlust; can heroes help? Part 1 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

Items

  • Admantine Chain Mail Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON5-2 - Bloodlust Contained
item.description: Brooch of Shielding and 2 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Contained

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

An unexpected enemy has appeared, attacking with ferocious bloodlust and unknown purpose. The locals can’t defend against this threat forever; heroes are needed to discover who is responsible for the attacks and stop them for good. Part 2 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

Items

  • Brooch of Shielding Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Hallucinatory Terrain Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Summon Lesser Demons Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON5-3 - Bloodlust Tempered
item.description: Ring of Mind-Shielding and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Tempered

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

With the marauders gone, peace returns to northern Alaron, but somebody brought the reavers across the straits of Moonshae to Alaron. They need to be stopped before the recent troubles become nothing more than the vanguard of something worse. Part 3 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

Items

  • Ring of Mind-Shielding Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

item.title: DDAL-EBEP-01 - The Iron Giant
item.description: Lantern of Revealing, Rope of Climbing, Shield, +1, a potion, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Iron Giant

Oracle of War Epic for Tier 1 Released on April 6, 2020

In this epic event, Cultists of the Emerald Claw reanimate a warforged colossus from the battlefields outside Salvation and turn it against the outpost. The scavengers in town must work together to disable the titan limb-by-limb and save the outpost from annihilation. They are aided throughout by the Oracle of War, which provides vital tactical advice alongside cryptic verses from the Draconic Prophecy.

Items

  • Lantern of Revealing Uncommon
  • Rope of Climbing Uncommon
  • Shield, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Legacy Events

Death is a Door

You died defending Salvation from its enemies. Mysterious forces brought you back to life, but you don’t know who they were or how they wielded such powerful magic.

Fallen Titan

The warforged colossus Big Moe was defeated. One of the salvage brokers, Irrulan Karnach, fled town just before the attack. Could she have been involved somehow?

  • If you’re interested in tailing Karnach you can invest 200 gp after this adventure into tracking her down. You discover a lead that she’s headed to Sharn. If you visit Sharn in a future adventure, you can locate her for questioning.

item.title: CCC-TRI-26 ROSE1-1 - Touch the Stars
item.description: Shadowneedle (Unbreakable Arrow), Shoes of the Glacier Walker (Boots of Striding and Springing), a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Touch the Stars

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

A battle rages in the sky above the Monastery of the Yellow Rose between illithid and githyanki, as a novice of the Yellow Rose carrying crucial knowledge has disappeared. As the Monastery of the Yellow Rose braces itself for the onslaught, you must use your wits and resources to find the missing novice. Will you succeed in time to save the Order of the Yellow Rose? Part One of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Shadowneedle (Unbreakable Arrow) Common
  • Shoes of the Glacier Walker (Boots of Striding and Springing) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Cause Fear Common

item.title: CCC-TRI-27 ROSE1-2 - In the Vault of Stars
item.description: Githyanki Greater Silver Sword (Silvered Greatsword, +2)
item.content:encoded:
In the Vault of Stars

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

A battle rages in the sky above the Monastery of the Yellow Rose between illithid and githyanki ships as shadowy shapes amass on the Glacier of the White Worm. As the Monastery of the Yellow Rose braces itself for the onslaught, you are sent onto the glacier in search of a secret githyanki base and to discover if the appearance of dragons brings ominous portents. Part Two of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Githyanki Greater Silver Sword (Silvered Greatsword, +2) Rare

item.title: CCC-TRI-28 ROSE1-3 - Siege of the Yellow Rose
item.description: Cosmic Chasuble (Robe of Stars)
item.content:encoded:
Siege of the Yellow Rose

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

Beyond the Glacier of the White Worm lies the Monastery of the Yellow Rose. High in the skies above the monastery, a battle rages between illithid and githyanki. While others search the monastery and the glacier for clues, you are asked to defend the monastery from those in the skies and on the ground. Can you defend the monastery long enough for the clues to be uncovered? Part Three of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Cosmic Chasuble (Robe of Stars) Very Rare

item.title: CCC-GSP02-01 - Minauros Unchained
item.description: Bulaga Wizard Hat (Hat of Vermin), a potion, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Minauros Unchained

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on March 2, 2020

The valkyrie Sigrdri is looking for adventurers to go with her to the Nine Hells. Tasked to free heroic souls that are supposed to go to Ysgard but instead are stuck somewhere in different layers of Hell. Her first mission is to save a loyal and fearless minotaur druid that’s currently trapped in Minauros, the 3rd layer of Hell. Part One of Heroes in Nine Hells.

Items

  • Bulaga Wizard Hat (Hat of Vermin) Common
  • 1 x The Heart of Baga (Elemental Gem, Red Corundum) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Banned: Minauros

Mammon’s baleful gaze is upon you. Perhaps you angered him directly, or perhaps your actions caused a disruption in his operations—whatever the case may be, he has elected to ban you from Minauros, the third layer of the Nine Hells, entirely. You can’t participate in further adventures in this place.

A character with this story award may visit other areas of the Nine Hells but has been banned from Minauros.

item.title: DDAL-EB-04 - The Third Protocol
item.description: Circlet of Blasting, The Oracle Detector, a potion, 2 story awards, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Third Protocol

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 29, 2020

The Oracle of War has been recovered from the Mournland. Its creators respond by activating the third protocol, an instruction to recover the device and eliminate all who know of its existence. As night falls, a posse of assassins step off the lightning rail with orders to raze Salvation to the ground and retrieve the Oracle.

The final adventure in the four-part Spoils of War storyline.

Items

  • Circlet of Blasting Uncommon
  • The Oracle Detector Unique
  • 1 x Acid (vial) Common
  • 1 x Oil of Slipperiness Uncommon
  • 1 x Poison, basic (vial) Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Legacy Events

Captured Assassin

You captured Saal Dreastroke or some of his cronies alive. Now you must decide what to do with them.

  • Turn them over to the Brelish authorities and gain 20 gp per captive.
  • Hold on to them in the hope that they could be useful. After each adventure that they remain in captivity, you must page 3 gp per captive on supplies.
Still Alive

Despite all the horrors you've seen, your friend Kalli (or the replacement you made for this character during DDAL-EB-01 The Night Land) remains alive and on your side. What does she do next?

  • Kalli heads to Morgrave University in Sharn to investigate the Oracle of War.
  • Kalli remains in Salvation and tries to set herself up as a salvage broker.

item.title: DDAL00-12a - Bad Seed
item.description: a potion and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Bad Seed

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 1 Released on February 19, 2020

Items

  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

A Helpful Distraction

Items
